eu.geclipse.ui.providers
Class ProgressRunner

java.lang.Object
  eu.geclipse.ui.providers.ProgressRunner
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ProgressRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Runnable implementation that loads the children of a lazy IGridContainer in background and offers the possibility to display a ProgressTreeNode in TreeViewers.

Constructor Summary
ProgressRunner(org.eclipse.jface.viewers.TreeViewer treeViewer, IGridContainer container)
          Construct a new ProgressRunner for the specified TreeViewer.
 
Method Summary

          Get the ProgressTreeNode used to show the progress of this operation.

Constructor Detail

ProgressRunner

public ProgressRunner(org.eclipse.jface.viewers.TreeViewer treeViewer,
                      IGridContainer container)
Construct a new ProgressRunner for the specified TreeViewer.

Parameters:
treeViewer - The TreeViewer where the progress of this operation will be shown. The progress is displayed as a child node of the provided IGridContainer.
container - The IGridContainer whose children should be loaded.

public ProgressTreeNode getMonitor()
Get the ProgressTreeNode used to show the progress of this operation.

Returns:
The associated ProgressTreeNode.
